background.introduction: Hi everyone! Nelson here, hailing from the vibrant city of Hong Kong. Armed with a Computer Science degree from Deakin University (still figuring out how to wield it properly!), I'm on the hunt for thrilling software engineering escapades. In the meantime, I'm whipping up code concoctions and soaking up new knowledge like a sponge. ü•î
background.description: I'm a junior software developer with a strong foundation in multiple programming languages and technologies. My current focus is on web development with Next.js, React, and TypeScript, along with backend experience in C# and various database technologies.

soft_skills.name: Problem Solving
soft_skills.description: Effectively identifies and resolves complex issues, utilizing analytical skills to develop and implement practical solutions.

soft_skills.name: Communication
soft_skills.description: Clearly conveys information both verbally and in writing, ensuring understanding among team members and stakeholders.

soft_skills.name: Adaptability
soft_skills.description: Quickly adapts to new technologies and methodologies, seamlessly integrating them into projects to enhance outcomes.

soft_skills.name: Team Collaboration
soft_skills.description: Works effectively with team members, contributing to a collaborative environment to achieve project goals.

soft_skills.name: Leadership
soft_skills.description: Guides and motivates team members, fostering a positive and productive work environment.

soft_skills.name: Time Management
soft_skills.description: Managing time and prioritizing tasks, ensuring projects are completed efficiently and deadlines are met.

soft_skills.name: Creativity
soft_skills.description: Develops innovative solutions, significantly enhancing project outcomes and user experience.

soft_skills.name: Attention to Detail
soft_skills.description: Meticulously reviews work, ensuring high-quality deliverables and minimizing errors.

soft_skills.name: Conflict Resolution
soft_skills.description: Effectively mediates conflicts, implementing solutions that maintain a harmonious work environment.

soft_skills.name: Decision Making
soft_skills.description: Makes informed and timely decisions, ensuring project success and continuity.

soft_skills.name: Self-Motivation
soft_skills.description: Highly self-driven, with a strong work ethic and a commitment to continuous improvement.

soft_skills.name: Multi-Tasking
soft_skills.description: Handles multiple tasks simultaneously, maintaining focus and productivity.

other_experience.title: Kitchen Hand
other_experience.description: Assisted in food preparation, maintaining kitchen cleanliness, and supporting culinary operations in a fast-paced environment.

other_experience.title: Uber Driver
other_experience.description: Provided reliable and efficient transportation/delivery services, ensuring customer satisfaction and adherence to platform standards.

other_experience.title: Cabineter
other_experience.description: Gained hands-on experience in cabinet making, including assembly, design, finishing, and quality control.

other_experience.title: Blood Donation
other_experience.description: Regularly donated blood to support community health initiatives and medical needs.

testimonials.quote: Nelson's attention to detail and problem-solving skills are exceptional. He delivers high-quality work and innovative solutions.
testimonials.author: Jeff Leng

testimonials.quote: Nelson was a great kitchen helper. He always kept a positive attitude, even during the busiest shifts.
testimonials.author: CL

testimonials.quote: Nelson showed a real desire to learn and quickly grasped automotive repair techniques during his internship.
testimonials.author: KT

coding_statistics.description: Nelson has moved beyond solo flights and is now confidently flying with passengers. He's not yet an airline captain, but he has solid skills and is ready for more complex journeys. Similarly, as a programmer, he transitioned from a novice to someone capable of building real applications and contributing meaningfully to software projects.
integrations: WakaTime API for live coding statistics
